briefTitle: Prospective Feasibility Study Applying the ACOSOG Z0011 Criteria to Chinese Patients
officialTitle: A Prospective Feasibility Study Applying the ACOSOG Z0011 Criteria to Chinese Patients With Early Breast Cancer Undergoing Breast-conserving Surgery
conditions: Breast Cancer, Sentinel Lymph Node, Local Recurrence of Malignant Tumor of Breast
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* histologically confirmed invasive breast cancer T1 or T2 tumor 1 or 2 positive sentinel lymph nodes breast-conserving surgery whole-breast RT planned

Exclusion Criteria:

* preoperative therapy 3 or more positive sentinel lymph nodes patients undergoing additional mastectomy due to positive surgical margins
